name: SIGURAT
description:
Survive as long as possible against a seemingly endless onslaught of enemies!

  • Bring a friend to fight alongside you using the same keyboard, even using remote play!
  • Collect and pilot new ships each with their own combination of weapon, ability, passive, and look!
  • Explore four different sectors, each with their own unique enemies!
  • Find ship black boxes to uncover secrets!
